levels.description:
Immediately <@ba.vdown>stop attacking</> until fully loaded, reload interval <@ba.vup>greatly reduces</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage and bind the enemy for <@ba.vup>{attack@unmove_duration}</>s
<@ba.rem>If an enemy is defeated while skill is active, gain {sp} SP when skill ends</>
